name: Moksha (itch) (VigilantGames)
description:
Moksha is a new interactive fiction experience from Vigilant Games. 

Drop into the shoes of Maya, a virtual experience designer living in a near future. She's testing and updating her latest creation, but something seems off. She can't decide if she knows her companion, who she is, or if she's even alive, then an encounter with another entity living in the simulation turns her entire existence on its head.
